SUMMARY
Product Manager with 6 years of experience launching successful SaaS products.
Skilled in roadmap planning, user research, and cross-functional team leadership.

EXPERIENCE

Senior Product Manager | CloudTech Solutions | New York, NY | 2021 - Present
• Manage product roadmap for enterprise cloud storage platform (5M+ users)
• Increased user engagement by 35% through data-driven feature prioritization
• Led cross-functional team of 12 engineers, designers, and marketers
• Launched 3 major features resulting in $2M ARR growth
• Conducted user research interviews with 50+ enterprise clients

Product Manager | Analytics Inc | Boston, MA | 2018 - 2021
• Owned product lifecycle for business intelligence dashboard product
• Grew monthly active users from 10K to 50K in 18 months
• Reduced customer churn by 25% through improved onboarding flow
• Collaborated with sales team to close 15 enterprise deals
• Presented product demos at 3 industry conferences

Associate Product Manager | StartupHub | Boston, MA | 2017 - 2018
• Assisted senior PM with feature development and user testing
• Analyzed user behavior data using SQL and Python
• Created product requirement documents for 8 features
• Coordinated with engineering team on sprint planning
